attributes.action: to completely remove the leglistation allowing the police to prosecute for motorist speeding offences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead motorists guilty of causing or having accidents should become responsible for their accidents and can be made to pay appropriate fines and the costs of all emergency services and related road maintenance and should face losing their driving licence.
Poor driving causes accidents rather than speeding and both factors are specific to individuals.
The state are clearly using speed cameras to generate revenue and increase the profits of establishment insurance businesses. This is blatant exploitation.
